endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of menus available for display to customers.
Submit a new customer order for processing in the kitchen.
Update the details or status of an existing order.
Cancel an order and remove it from the queue.
Check the current operational status and workload of the kitchen.
Process a payment for an order securely and in real-time.
Fetch the list of current reservations for seating customers.
Submit customer feedback for review and analysis.
Access the current inventory levels for ingredient and supply management.
Update configuration settings for restaurant service operations.
